verses.1: Ka cihmawh ciangin Topaʼ tungah ka kiko a, amah in hong dawng hi.
verses.2: Topa aw, mizuaute le mi khemteʼ kiang panin kei hong hon khia in.
verses.3: Mi khem theite aw, noteʼ tungah bang hong kipia dinga, noteʼ tungah bang hong kihih ding ahi hiam?
verses.4: Galhang paʼ thal hiamte le sesing hol-am hi ding hi.
verses.5: Note lakah ka om khak pen Meshek gam sungah ten khak sangin haksa zaw a, Kedar mite lakah ten khak sangin siahuai zaw hi.
verses.6: Gal kilemna a deih lo mite lakah sauvei ka teng lua kha hi.
verses.7: Kei pen gal kilemna a ngaihsun mi ka hi hi. Ahih hangin kilem nading thu ka gen ciangin amaute in gal kido ding utna tengin nei uh hi.
